statements: SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, check_in_date FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, room_number FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT guest_name FROM reservations WHERE is_cancelled = false;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE guest_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT reservation_id FROM reservations WHERE check_out_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE room_number BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT guest_email FROM reservations WHERE is_cancelled = true;
SELECT DISTINCT room_number FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM reservations WHERE guest_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date > '2022-06-01' AND check_out_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT room_number) FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(room_number) FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE is_cancelled = false ORDER BY check_in_date;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name FROM reservations WHERE room_number = 202;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, room_number FROM reservations WHERE guest_email = 'example@gmail.com' AND is_cancelled = FALSE;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE room_number IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND is_cancelled = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date >= '2021-12-01';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM reservations WHERE guest_name LIKE 'Alex%';
SELECT DISTINCT room_number FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date < '2022-05-01' AND is_cancelled = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT guest_name FROM reservations WHERE is_cancelled = TRUE;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, room_number FROM reservations WHERE guest_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT AVG(room_number) AS average_room_number FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE check_out_date = (SELECT MAX(check_out_date) FROM reservations);
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE check_out_date < '2022-07-01' AND is_cancelled = FALSE;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM reservations WHERE check_out_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cancelled_reservations FROM reservations WHERE is_cancelled = TRUE;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number FROM reservations WHERE guest_name = 'Alice' AND is_cancelled = FALSE;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, check_in_date FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date > '2022-06-01' AND is_cancelled = FALSE;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number FROM reservations WHERE room_number NOT IN (201, 202);
SELECT MIN(check_in_date) AS earliest_check_in_date FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM Guest;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM Guest;
SELECT guest_name, guest_phone FROM Guest WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Reservation;
SELECT room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Reservation WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id WHERE Reservation.check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id WHERE Reservation.check_out_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id WHERE Guest.guest_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id WHERE Guest.guest_name LIKE '%son%' AND Reservation.room_number = 101;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id WHERE Guest.guest_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM Reservation;
SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(check_out_date, check_in_date)) AS average_stay_days FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT room_number, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM Reservation GROUP BY room_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT guest_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(check_out_date, check_in_date)) AS total_stay_days FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, MAX(DATEDIFF(check_out_date, check_in_date)) AS longest_stay_days FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, MIN(DATEDIFF(check_out_date, check_in_date)) AS shortest_stay_days FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, AVG(room_number) AS average_room_number FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, MAX(room_number) AS highest_room_number FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, MIN(room_number) AS lowest_room_number FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM Guest WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Reservation JOIN Guest ON Reservation.guest_id = Guest.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest LEFT JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest RIGHT JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest INNER JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest LEFT OUTER JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest RIGHT OUTER JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest INNER OUTER JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM Reservation WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, COUNT(*) AS reservations_count FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name, guest_email;
SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) AS reservations_count FROM Guest LEFT JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, SUM(room_number) AS total_rooms_booked FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, AVG(room_number) AS avg_rooms_booked FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, MAX(room_number) AS max_rooms_booked FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, MIN(room_number) AS min_rooms_booked FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT * FROM Reservation WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Reservation WHERE room_number IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest JOIN Reservation ON Guest.guest_id = Reservation.guest_id WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT * FROM Guest WHERE guest_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Reservation ORDER BY check_in_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM guest_reservations;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM guest_reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name FROM guest_reservations;
SELECT * FROM rooms;
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM rooms;
SELECT * FROM reservations_history;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations_history;
SELECT history_id, guest_name FROM reservations_history;
SELECT reservation_id, check_in_date FROM guest_reservations;
SELECT room_number, rate FROM rooms;
SELECT history_id, reservation_id, guest_name FROM reservations_history;
SELECT guest_name, check_out_date FROM guest_reservations;
SELECT room_number, room_type, rate FROM rooms;
SELECT * FROM guest_reservations WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM reservations_history WHERE check_in_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT reservation_id FROM guest_reservations WHERE guest_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE rate > 100;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date FROM guest_reservations WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_number, rate FROM rooms WHERE room_type = 'Suite';
SELECT * FROM guest_reservations WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM rooms WHERE available = true;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date FROM guest_reservations WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM reservations_history WHERE check_out_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT SUM(rate) AS total_revenue FROM rooms WHERE room_type = 'Suite';
SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM guest_reservations GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT room_number, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM guest_reservations GROUP BY room_number HAVING reservation_count > 1;
SELECT r.*, rh.guest_name AS guest FROM guest_reservations r INNER JOIN reservations_history rh ON r.reservation_id = rh.reservation_id;
SELECT DISTINCT room_type FROM rooms;
SELECT guest_name, MAX(check_in_date) AS last_checkin FROM guest_reservations GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT r.room_number, r.room_type, rh.guest_name FROM rooms r LEFT JOIN reservations_history rh ON r.room_number = rh.history_id;
SELECT guest_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(check_out_date, check_in_date)) AS avg_stay_days FROM reservations_history GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations, SUM(DATEDIFF(check_out_date, check_in_date)) AS total_stay_days FROM reservations_history GROUP BY guest_name ORDER BY total_stay_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM guest_reservations WHERE check_in_date = (SELECT MIN(check_in_date) FROM guest_reservations);
SELECT guest_name, AVG(rate) AS avg_rate FROM rooms r INNER JOIN guest_reservations gr ON r.room_type = gr.room_type GROUP BY guest_name;
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE rate > (SELECT AVG(rate) FROM rooms);
SELECT DISTINCT guest_name FROM guest_reservations WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM reservations_history WHERE guest_name = guest_reservations.guest_name);
SELECT r.room_number, r.room_type, COUNT(rh.history_id) AS reservation_count FROM rooms r LEFT JOIN reservations_history rh ON r.room_number = rh.room_number GROUP BY r.room_number, r.room_type;
SELECT DISTINCT guest_name FROM guest_reservations WHERE guest_name NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT guest_name FROM reservations_history);

SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations, SUM(rate) AS total_revenue FROM guest_reservations gr INNER JOIN rooms r ON gr.room_type = r.room_type GROUP BY guest_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM Guest_Reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, room_number, check_in_date FROM Guest_Reservations;
SELECT guest_name, room_number FROM Guest_Reservations WHERE check_in_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Rooms;
SELECT room_number, room_type, capacity FROM Rooms WHERE is_booked = FALSE;
SELECT room_number, price_per_night FROM Rooms WHERE capacity >= 2;
SELECT * FROM Guests;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, email FROM Guests WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM Reservations_History;
SELECT guest_id, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM Reservations_History WHERE check_out_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, total_amount FROM Guest_Reservations GR JOIN Reservations_History RH ON GR.reservation_id = RH.reservation_id;
SELECT GR.guest_name, RH.room_number, RH.check_in_date, RH.total_amount FROM Guest_Reservations GR JOIN Reservations_History RH ON GR.reservation_id = RH.reservation_id;
SELECT * FROM Guest_Reservations WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Rooms WHERE price_per_night <= 200;
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number FROM Guests WHERE guest_name LIKE '%John%' OR guest_name LIKE '%Mary%';
SELECT * FROM Rooms WHERE price_per_night > 150 AND capacity >= 4;
SELECT guest_name, room_type, check_in_date, total_amount FROM Guest_Reservations GR JOIN Reservations_History RH ON GR.reservation_id = RH.reservation_id WHERE total_amount > 500;
SELECT GR.guest_name, RH.room_number, GR.check_in_date, RH.total_amount FROM Guest_Reservations GR JOIN Reservations_History RH ON GR.reservation_id = RH.reservation_id WHERE RH.total_amount > 1000;

SELECT GR.guest_name, RH.room_number, GR.check_in_date, RH.total_amount FROM Guest_Reservations GR JOIN Reservations_History RH ON GR.reservation_id = RH.reservation_id WHERE GR.check_in_date >= '2023-01-01' AND RH.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Rooms WHERE room_type = 'Suite';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest_Reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Guest_Reservations;
SELECT room_number, room_type, price_per_night FROM Rooms WHERE capacity > 2;
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number FROM Guests WHERE guest_id = 5;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest_Reservations WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Rooms WHERE is_booked = TRUE;

SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM Guest_Reservations INNER JOIN Reservations_History ON Guest_Reservations.reservation_id = Reservations_History.reservation_id WHERE Guest_Reservations.check_in_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT room_number, room_type, price_per_night FROM Rooms WHERE price_per_night > 100;

SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest_Reservations INNER JOIN Guests ON Guest_Reservations.guest_name = Guests.guest_name WHERE Guest_Reservations.check_out_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guest_Reservations INNER JOIN Guests ON Guest_Reservations.guest_name = Guests.guest_name WHERE Guests.email LIKE '%@example.com%';

SELECT guest_name, email, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM Guests JOIN Reservations_History ON Guests.guest_id = Reservations_History.guest_id WHERE Reservations_History.total_amount > 500;

SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM Guests JOIN Reservations_History ON Guests.guest_id = Reservations_History.guest_id WHERE Reservations_History.total_amount BETWEEN 300 AND 800;

SELECT G.guest_name, R.room_number, G.email, RH.total_amount FROM Guests G JOIN Reservations_History RH ON G.guest_id = RH.guest_id JOIN Rooms R ON RH.room_number = R.room_number WHERE RH.check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT G.guest_name, R.room_number, G.email, RH.total_amount FROM Guests G JOIN Reservations_History RH ON G.guest_id = RH.guest_id JOIN Rooms R ON RH.room_number = R.room_number WHERE RH.check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT room_number, room_type, price_per_night FROM Rooms WHERE room_type IN ('Suite', 'Standard');
SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Guests WHERE phone_number LIKE '1%';
SELECT R.room_type, R.capacity, R.price_per_night, RH.total_amount FROM Rooms R JOIN Reservations_History RH ON R.room_number = RH.room_number WHERE RH.check_in_date < '2022-08-15';

SELECT G.guest_name, G.email, R.room_number, RH.check_in_date, RH.check_out_date FROM Guests G JOIN Reservations_History RH ON G.guest_id = RH.guest_id JOIN Rooms R ON RH.room_number = R.room_number WHERE G.email NOT LIKE '%@gmail.com%';

SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM Guests JOIN Reservations_History ON Guests.guest_id = Reservations_History.guest_id WHERE Guests.guest_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM Guests JOIN Reservations_History ON Guests.guest_id = Reservations_History.guest_id WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT guest_name, email, phone_number, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date, total_amount FROM Guests JOIN Reservations_History ON Guests.guest_id = Reservations_History.guest_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT room_number, availability FROM RoomAvailability;
SELECT * FROM Rooms;
SELECT room_number, room_type, rate FROM Rooms;

SELECT hotel_name, address, phone_number FROM Hotel;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM GuestReservations JOIN Rooms ON GuestReservations.reservation_id = Rooms.room_id;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM GuestReservations LEFT JOIN Rooms ON GuestReservations.reservation_id = Rooms.room_id;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM GuestReservations RIGHT JOIN Rooms ON GuestReservations.reservation_id = Rooms.room_id;
SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM GuestReservations INNER JOIN Rooms ON GuestReservations.reservation_id = Rooms.room_id;

SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM GuestReservations JOIN Rooms ON GuestReservations.reservation_id = Rooms.room_id JOIN RoomAvailability ON Rooms.room_id = RoomAvailability.room_id;

SELECT guest_name, room_number, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM GuestReservations JOIN Rooms ON GuestReservations.reservation_id = Rooms.room_id JOIN RoomAvailability ON Rooms.room_id = RoomAvailability.room_id WHERE RoomAvailability.availability = true;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_reservations FROM GuestReservations;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_rooms_available FROM RoomAvailability WHERE availability = true;
SELECT MAX(rate) as max_room_rate, MIN(rate) as min_room_rate FROM Rooms;
SELECT * FROM GuestReservations WHERE check_in_date = '2023-07-15';
SELECT * FROM GuestReservations WHERE guest_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM GuestReservations;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM GuestReservations;
SELECT g.guest_name, r.room_number, r.room_type FROM Guests g JOIN GuestReservations gr ON g.guest_id = gr.guest_id JOIN Rooms r ON gr.room_id = r.room_id;
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT room_number, availability FROM RoomAvailability WHERE room_number BETWEEN 101 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Rooms WHERE rate > 100;
SELECT * FROM Guests WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Hotel WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT guest_name, phone_number, r.room_number, r.rate FROM Guests g JOIN GuestReservations gr ON g.guest_id = gr.guest_id JOIN Rooms r ON gr.room_id = r.room_id;
SELECT hotel_name, address, phone_number FROM Hotel;
SELECT g.guest_name, gr.check_in_date, gr.check_out_date, r.room_number, r.rate FROM Guests g JOIN GuestReservations gr ON g.guest_id = gr.guest_id JOIN Rooms r ON gr.room_id = r.room_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GuestReservations;
SELECT MIN(check_in_date), MAX(check_out_date) FROM GuestReservations;
SELECT AVG(rate) AS average_rate FROM Rooms;
SELECT DISTINCT room_type FROM Rooms;
SELECT guest_name, phone_number, email FROM Guests WHERE phone_number LIKE '1%';
SELECT SUM(rate) AS total_revenue FROM GuestReservations gr JOIN Rooms r ON gr.room_id = r.room_id;
SELECT * FROM Guests ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT hotel_name, address FROM Hotel;
SELECT guest_name, check_out_date FROM GuestReservations WHERE check_out_date >= '2022-01-01';
